chapters.title: Chapter 3: Hill of the Golden Dawn
chapters.info: Colavaere Saighan, p. 97 (113)—New queen of Cairhien after Rand left as a prisoner to the Aes Sedai. She took the throne herself, without Rand's blessing, although she told everyone that he had given it to her. She was told by the Aes Sedai that Rand would never return.
